name: Ballapalooza
description:
A simple ball game where you must solve puzzles, platform, and dodge obstacles to collect rings and complete levels.

Up to 50 unique levels to play.


Use powerups to complete levels by jumping, cloning and spawning boxes.


A speedrun mode to see how fast you can complete the game! If you are good enough you can beat the game with the game without dying in the speedrun mode and complete the PERFECT RUN!


Choose what color you want to have your ball be.
